items.title: Oklahoma Black Lives Matter leader indicted for fraud, money laundering
items.description: The longtime leader of the Black Lives Matter movement in Oklahoma City has been indicted for fraud and money laundering

items.title: Efforts to require Asian American history in schools after anti-Asian hate starting to pay off

items.title: Court blocks release of hundreds of immigrants arrested in Chicago-area crackdown
items.description: A federal appeals court has blocked the immediate release of hundreds of immigrants detained during a Chicago-area immigration crackdown

items.title: Church nativity scenes add zip ties, gas masks and ICE to protest immigration raids
items.description: Nativity scenes at some churches are sparking fierce debates
